definition.text: Superalgos allows running the Client on a machine and accessing it via Chrome from another machine in the network.

paragraphs.text: Many users choose to run the Client in the cloud, on single-board machines like the Raspberry Pi, or on a dedicated PC that they can leave on at all times when trading live. The My Computer Network Node represents the machine the Client is running on.

At this stage, Superalgos does not implement any form of security. You should use the system in the context of a restricted Local Area Network only. If you chose to run the Client in the cloud, you must implement your own security.
